name: Who Is God?
question: Who is God?
answer: God is the only living and true God. He's the all-glorious, almighty, all-knowing, sovereign Creator and Lord of the whole universe. God is perfect and holy, infinite, eternal, and unchanging.
verseText: To the King, eternal, immortal, invisible, the only God, be honor and glory forever and ever. Amen.

name: Who Made God?
question: Who made God?
answer: Nobody made God.
verseText: Before the mountains were born, or the earth and the world You brought forth, from everlasting to everlasting, You are God.

name: Has God Ever Had a Beginning?
question: Has God ever had a beginning?
answer: No, God has always been.
verseText: Holy, Holy, Holy is the Lord God Almighty, who was and is and is to come.

name: Will God Ever Die?
question: Will God ever die?
answer: No, God lives forever!
verseText: Forever and ever, He is the living God and the everlasting King.;Your years go on and on through all generations, You remain the same, Your years will never end.

name: Are There More Gods Than One?
question: Are there more gods than one?
answer:
No, there is only one true God.
In Isaiah 45 God says "I am the Lord. Apart from me, there is no god. I am God, and there is no other, I am God. I am God, and there is none like me. A righteous God and a Savior turn to me and be saved, all you ends of the earth; for I am God."

name: In How Many Persons Does This One God Exist?
question: In how many persons does this one God exist?
answer: God exists in three persons.
verseText: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all.

name: Who Are the Three Persons of God?
question: Who are the three persons of God?
answer: The three persons of God are the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.
verseText: Therefore go and make disciples of every nation, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Ghost.

name: Where Is God?
question: Where is God?
answer: God is everywhere.
verseText: Where can I go from Your Spirit? Where can I flee from Your presence, O Lord? If I go up to the heavens, You are there; if I make my bed in the depths, You are there.

name: Can You See God?
question: Can you see God?
answer: No, God is a spirit, and He doesn't have a body like man. Though I cannot see God, I know He always sees me.
verseText: "Am I only a God nearby, and not a God far away? Can anyone hide in secret places so that I cannot see Him? Do not I fill heaven and earth?" declares the Lord.

name: Does God Know All Things?
question: Does God know all things?
answer: Yes, God knows all things. Nothing can be hidden from God.
verseText: His eyes are on the ways of men; He sees their every step.;The eyes of the Lord are in every place, watching the evil and the good.

name: Can God Do All Things?
question: Can God do all things?
answer: Yes, God can do all His holy will.
verseText: With God all things are possible.

name: Who Made You?
question: Who made you?
answer: God made me.
verseText: He created man in His own image, in the image of God He created him; male and female He created them.

name: Why Did God Make You?
question: Why did God make you?
answer: I was made to glorify God and enjoy Him forever.
verseText: So, whether you eat or you drink, or whatever you do, do it all for the glory of God.

name: What Else Did God Make?
question: What else did God make?
answer: God made all things. God made everything.
verseText: In the beginning, God made the heavens and the earth. God made light, day and night, sky, land, and seas, the plants and trees, sun, moon, and stars, birds, fish, and all the creatures of the land. Then the most wonderful creation, God made man. In the image of God, male and female He created them.

name: Why Did God Make All Things?
question: Why did God make all things?
answer: For His own glory.
verseText: For from Him and through Him and to Him are all things. To Him be the glory forever! Amen.

name: How Can You Glorify God?
question: How can you glorify God?
answer: I can glorify God by loving Him and doing what He commands.
verseText: He has shown you, O man, what is good and what the Lord requires of you: to act justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with your God.

name: Why Should You Glorify God?
question: Why should you glorify God?
answer: I should glorify God because He made me and takes care of me.
verseText: Praise the Lord, all you nations! Extol Him, all you peoples! For great is His love toward us.

name: Who Were Our First Parents?
question: Who were our first parents?
answer: Adam and Eve were our first parents.
verseText: Then God said, "It is not good for man to be alone. I will make a helper suitable for him." Then the Lord God made a woman, and He brought her to the man, and he named his wife, Eve, for she would be the mother of all mankind.

name: How Did God Make Adam and Eve?
question: How did God make Adam and Eve?
answer: God made the body of Adam from the dust of the ground and formed Eve from the body of Adam.
verseText: God formed the man from the dust of the ground.;God made the woman from the rib of the man.

name: What Did God Give Adam and Eve Besides Bodies?
question: What did God give Adam and Eve besides bodies?
answer: God gave them spirits that could never die.
verseText: The Lord God formed the man from the dust of the ground and breathed into him the breath of life, and the man became a living being.

name: You Have Spirit as Well as a Body?
question: Do you have a spirit as well as a body?
answer: Yes, I have a spirit that can never die.
verseText: The dust returns to the ground, and the spirit returns to God who gave it.

name: What Were Adam and Eve Like When God Made Them?
question: What were Adam and Eve like when God made them?
answer: God made them holy and happy.
verseText: The man and his wife were both happy and felt no shame.
